successes.title: The first HEAD-UP DISPLAY for Your Motorcycle Helmet
successes.description: Keep your eyes on the road with our retrofittable Head-Up Display for your motorcycle helmet.

Pledges.description:
OUR ETERNAL GRATITUDE: 
Help us take motorsports to the next level! You'll receive a sincere thank you from the entire NUVIZ team and we'll keep you up to date on all of our progress developing the NUVIZ Ride:HUD.
NUVIZ BEANIE: Winter is here - stay warm with our limited edition NUVIZ beanie. Our NUVIZ apparel will ship immediately after the successfully funded campaign.

NUVIZ T-SHIRT: Show your support with a limited edition NUVIZ t-shirt, available in black or white in all sizes either in a men's or women's cut. Our NUVIZ apparel will ship immediately after the successfully funded campaign.

NUVIZ HAT: Get your limited edition NUVIZ hat - our 3D embroidered, super comfortable Flexfit hat with airmesh sides and back available in L/XL and S/M. Our NUVIZ apparel will ship immediately after the successfully funded campaign.
NUVIZ HOODIE: Stay cozy in our limited edition NUVIZ hoodie available in black in all sizes. Our NUVIZ apparel will ship immediately after the successfully funded campaign.
NUVIZ APPAREL PACKAGE: Wear our colors and get your limited edition NUVIZ beanie, t-shirt, hat and hoodie. Our apparel will ship immediately after the successfully funded campaign.

MEET THE TEAM: Get on your bike and ride out to our labs in sunny San Diego or Washington DC. You spend the day with the team, we show you the latest development and take you out for burger and drinks afterwards.
NUVIZ Ride:HUD - EARLIEST BIRD SPECIAL: Receive your NUVIZ Ride:HUD Kickstarter special edition. We'll also send you the NUVIZ t-shirt right after the successfully funded campaign.
NUVIZ Ride:HUD - EARLIEST BIRD SPECIAL "EXTENDED": Receive your NUVIZ Ride:HUD Kickstarter special edition. We'll also send you the NUVIZ t-shirt right after the successfully funded campaign.
NUVIZ Ride:HUD - EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: Receive your NUVIZ Ride:HUD Kickstarter special edition. We'll also send you the NUVIZ t-shirt right after the successfully funded campaign.
NUVIZ Ride:HUD - ALMOST EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: Receive your NUVIZ Ride:HUD Kickstarter special edition. We'll also send you the NUVIZ t-shirt right after the successfully funded campaign.

NUVIZ Ride:HUD SPECIAL BUNDLE: Receive the NUVIZ Ride:HUD Kickstarter special edition and NUVIZ apparel package consisting of beanie, t-shirt, hat and hoodie. Our NUVIZ apparel will ship immediately after the successfully funded campaign.

SPEND THE WEEKEND WITH US: We invite you to sunny San Diego to the NUVIZ lab where you'll spend the weekend hanging out with the team and checking out all of our latest work. Bring your helmet because we'll provide you with a 24h Harley Davidson rental of your choice from http://www.sandiegoharley.com/ so we can take you on our favorite rides in Southern California. Two nights in a San Diego Downtown hotel and all meals are included - airfare is not. Of course you'll also receive a NUVIZ Ride:HUD...!

CELEBRATE WITH US: We`ll fly you out to San Diego to be our VIP guest at our launch event and host you and one other guest for 3 days, 2 nights. Flights, hotel and all meals included (please add $1500 for non US-residents). Of course you'll also receive two NUVIZ Ride:HUDs...!
